database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    The DatabaseAccess class is used to perform all interactions with the database. It returns pre-wrapped outputs, ready to send back to the client.
    Author:
    Kristopher Miles

        public Database()

    • Method Detail

      • validateUser

        public User validateUser(AuthenticationWrapper authInput)
        Searches the database for the input user's username and password.
        Parameters:
        authInput - The pre-wrapped username and password to test against the database
        Returns:
        The User model object coresponding to the input username and password if the credentials are valid, null otherwise.

      • getProjects

        public ProjectListWrapper getProjects(AuthenticationWrapper authInput)
        Lists all the projects presently in the database, getting their name and Project ID number.
        Parameters:
        authInput - User performing this operation. Without valid cradentials this list will not be given.
        Returns:
        A pre-wrapped ProjectListWrapper containing all projects if successful, null otherwise.

      • getSampleImage

        public ImageWrapper getSampleImage(ProjectChoiceWrapper project)
        Gives the user an image from the project they selected.
        Parameters:
        project - pre-wrapped Project selection.
        Returns:
        a pre-wrapped ImageWrapper object containing the sample image if successful, null otherwise.

      • downloadBatch

        public BatchWrapper downloadBatch(ProjectChoiceWrapper project)
        Chooses a batch from the server based on project selection that has not yet been worked on and packages it for transport.
        Parameters:
        project - pre-wrapped Project selection
        Returns:
        pre-Wrapped batchWrapper object containg all required information about the batch if succeeds, null otherwise.

      • submitBatch

        public boolean submitBatch(FinishedBatchWrapper doneBatch)
        Processes a submited batch and adds its results into the database.
        Parameters:
        doneBatch - the pre-wrapped input batch and all required information about it.
        Returns:
        true if the database operation completes successfully, false otherwise.

      • getFields

        public FieldListWrapper getFields(ProjectChoiceWrapper project)
        Obtains the list of fields for a given project
        Parameters:
        project - The pre-wrapped project selection and authentication information.
        Returns:
        A pre-wrapped list of all the fields from the selected project if the operaton succeeds, null otherwise.

      • search

        public SearchResultsWrapper search(SearchInputWrapper searchIn)
        Searches the fields chosen in the database for the specific pattern indicated.
        Parameters:
        searchIn - The pre-wrapped fields to search, authentication information, and pattern to search for.
        Returns:
        The results of the search wrapped for transport, or null if the search fails for any reason. Should no results be found, an empty wrapper is returned.

        java.sql.Connection getCurrentConnection()
